page.title: 07Worlingworth/Bedfield Stores
page.content: Worlingworth Stores. Q1What do you sell other than food & drink? A1Anything you would expect to buy from a small general stores eg.cigarettes, tobacco,stationery,garden sundries,toys & cleaning materials. Q2What attracts most customers? A2 60% buy groceries 40% use Post Office 25% buy tobacco. Q3How important is this sort of shop? A3Mainly for older people without cars. Q4How would people react to closure? A4They would appreciate its value but those without cars would miss it most. Bedfield Post Office Stores stocks 20000 grocery lines.It is an Off licence,a Post Office & stocks Green- Grocery,hardware,drapery,electrical & fancy goods,stationery,footwear,books & decorating materials.
